ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 163
ygData.msgSnippet: Tinkering pets would be cool. They d make the icon look like a poke mon ball! lol But with the way tinking is going the compents will be 100p And all it does
ygData.messageBody:
Tinkering pets would be cool.
They'd make the icon look like a poke'mon ball! lol
But with the way tinking is going the compents will be 100p
And all it does is lauches fire works then blows up.

-Dave
